blurb.html: Let’s explore what means community at Elastic and how it plays an important role for our projects.

desc.html: Community at Elastic David Pilato, Developer | Evangelist @dadoonet

Community YouTube Channel ● Meetup recordings and solution-focused videos: ○ Beginner’s Crash Course to Elastic Stack ● Segmented by language ● Scale and expand our reach ● Share with with customers and potential customers Subscribe!
Goals 1) Download 2) Play 3) POC 4) Move to production 8

For the company hosting the BBL • Attendees: attend a conference without having to sacrifice one or two days, or going to meetups in the evening. • Team manager: team education during the lunch break, so no impact on the production. • Company: mix and gather people from different services in the same room. 9

For me • Meet people you never meet at conferences ‒ They don’t want to go at conferences ‒ The company does not allow them to go ‒ They are too shy to engage with you in public and are feeling more confident with colleagues • Create / enrich the community ‒ Finding new attendees ‒ Finding new hosts ‒ Finding new speakers / stories 10

Contributor Program We created the Elastic Contributor Program to recognize and reward the hard work of our awesome contributors, encourage knowledge sharing within the Elastic community, and build friendly competition around contributions. ● ● ● ● ● ● ● ● Organizing meetups, hackathons, events and workshops; Speaking at conferences or giving lectures; Writing articles or blog posts; Recording tutorials or use cases videos; Translating existing materials to local languages; Coding contributions; Answering technical questions on designated forums; Validating others contributions; The program runs annually and the 30 highest scorers from each region (Amer, EMEA, APJ) win awesome prizes! Learn more about the program on our website and invite friends to join it. https://www.elastic.co/community/contributor

Elastic for Students and Educators What we do: ● ● ● ● Free Product Access Free Training/Support (on demand courses) Student focused presentations and workshops Connect and network with the community How you can help/get involved: ● ● ● ● Connect with your university/student organization Host a workshop/guest lecture Let us know about student events to sponsor Share your ideas/input! Reach out directly to discuss how you can engage: Stephanie Raiguel stephanie.nissen@elastic.co
